entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Optimize EnsureInstructionSetFlagsAreValid #77190
    8.0.0
  • make GC's PAL implementation include the right dump info #77184
    8.0.0
  • ImmutableArray<T> struct implements IEquatable<T> interface but does not stick to the rules of properly implementing value semantics #77183
  • System.Threading.RateLimiting Rate Limiting internal queue does not check the queued request status while replenishment process #77180
  • Discussion: ObjWriter in C# #77178
  • dotnet.d.ts should be include in the wasmbrowser template #77174
  • Breaking change: Untyped Deserialize no longer forwards the type to JsonConverter<T> #77173
    7.0.0
  • JSExport did not export top-level statements #77167
  • [API Proposal]: TrimTrailingFractionalZeros for decimal #77165
  • Lack of CS0165 (Use of unassigned local variable) for DateOnly and TimeOnly types #77177
  • [Android] Package libmonosgen-2.0.so with debug symbols in the runtime pack #77161
    Future
  • MediaTypeHeaderValue.Parse throws FormatException with null string #77160
  • DotNet 7 Regression when reading large Zip files #77159
    7.0.0
  • [pgo] Assert failure: (pCtx->Pc < codestart) || (pCtx->Pc >= codeend) #77156
    8.0.0
  • [pgo] windows arm/arm64 test jobs almost always timeout #77155
    8.0.0
  • [jitstress] ParserTests failing on correct (displayed) values #77154
    8.0.0
  • [jitstress] nullref in DefaultMode_Missing_AllMethods_ReportsDiagnostic #77153
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'unused->OperIs(GT_CNS_INT)' #77152
    8.0.0
  • .NET 7.0 RC2 Microbenchmarks Performance Study Report #77150
    Future
  • asmhelpers.asm(5210) : warning A4228: Alignment value exceeds AREA alignment; alignment not guaranteed #77146
  • Test failure JIT/Stress/ABI/pinvokes_d/pinvokes_d.sh #77145
  • JIT fullpgo_random_edge crash running System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests #77144
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'data->GetRegNum() != REG_WRITE_BARRIER_DST' #77143
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'data->GetRegNum() != REG_ARG_0' #77141
    8.0.0
  • HTTP/3 connection or stream shutdown is slow #77139

Closed

  • The interop source generators generate an empty file if unused. #76298
    8.0.0
  • System.AccessViolationException when using current version (68.2.0.9) of Microsoft.ICU.ICU4C.Runtime with .NET SDK v6.0.402 #77045
    6.0.x
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'next != def && "found def after use"' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #77158
    8.0.0
  • Test failure in System.Transactions.Tests.OleTxTests.* tests #76836
    8.0.0
  • Interface Promise Comments! [API Proposal]: #77179
  • TLS 1.2 - Zero length fragment error occurs in .NET Core when spec allows it #30554
    8.0.0
  • Suboptimal codegen for UIntPtr in contrast to nuint #54463
    Future
  • API documentation debt - Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection #43871
    Future
  • superpmicollect access violation in pgo Bytemark #76991
    8.0.0
  • API documentation debt - Microsoft.Extensions.Logging #43918
    Future
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 5 Regressions on 9/27/2022 12:44:07 AM #76390
  • Build fails on clean WSL machine #77168
  • dotnet pack does not respect target framework conditions #77164
  • WebSocketHandle always adds "known" request headers to connection headers even if the caller specified these themselves, duplicating entries. #73564
    8.0.0
  • JsonIgnoreCondition.WhenWritingNull doesn't play well with required nullable properties #76527
    8.0.0
  • [mono] Loader/classloader/StaticVirtualMethods/RegressionTests/GitHub_71319 crashes with runtime assertion failure #71910
    8.0.0
  • JavaScript interop not marshalling Task<ArraySegment<byte>> and Task<Array> #77157
    7.0.x
  • JIT: GDV reorders null checks of 'this' with arguments #75607
    8.0.0
  • .NET 7.0 RC1 Microbenchmarks Performance Study Report #76320
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Update .vsconfig file #77189
    documentation, area-Meta, 8.0.0
  • Add missing docs for `M.E.Configuration.Xml` #77188
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • [release/7.0] Don't generate a nearly empty file #77187
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Fix regression when serializing untyped polymorphic root-level custom converters. #77186
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Adds `ActivatorUtilities.CreateFactory<T>` API #77185
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • System.Threading.RateLimiting de-queue canceled request #77182
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Fix unzipping 4GB+ zip files #77181
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • JIT: Clean up inliner substitution #77176
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • EventListener: Add test for logging a null string in an EventSource #77172
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution
  • [wasm] interp perf to dev tools #77171
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [mono][sgen] Fix detection of weakref objects #77170
    area-GC-mono
  • #76881 internal properties in GetRuntimeProperties are not shown #77169
  • Trim file type bits from mode header #77151
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Move linker to runtime #77149
    linkable-framework
  • [wasm] Fix support for debugging wasm debugger tests with VSCode #77148
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.0
  • Update System.Speech to Eric/Jeff #77142
    area-Meta, 8.0.0

Merged

  • Don't generate a nearly empty file #76835
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Fixes a wrong not node insertion producing broken lir range on macos arm64 #77166
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Swallow MSDTC availability exceptions for CI test reliability #77023
    area-System.Transactions
  • Update Strings.resx #77175
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix loading app-local ICU #77117
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Globalization, 6.0.x
  • Modify __int64 definition in PAL to match the OS definition #77056
    area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Move leap seconds DateTime configuration statics into LeapSecondCache #77163
  • API Debt - Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection #76940
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • JIT: fix out of bounds read during SPMI collection #77147
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Logging API doc additions #77127
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Update README.md's to use "contribution bar" #77134
    documentation, area-System.Reflection
  • Update Unix dependencies installation script #77107
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Don't check handles in substitution #76730
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Fix loading app-local ICU #77118
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Globalization, 7.0.x
  • [mono][workload] Add workloads for win-arm64 using emulation #68994
    area-Build-mono
  • [mono][tests] Update instantiate_info to use mono_class_interface_offset_with_variance for interface offset #77113
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • JIT: Evaluate GDV call args early #75634
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Avoid runtime "atomic write" check in ConcurrentDictionary for shared generics #77005
    area-System.Collections
  • Update area-System.IO.Pipelines lead #77111
    area-Meta, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] fix debug assert on large number of virtual methods #77106
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution

Updated

  • [IGNORE] [Experiment] Try to return MSBuild Server back. #76536
    NO-MERGE
  • PGO: Add new tiers #70941
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Introduce WASM JITs for interpreter opcodes and interp_entry wrappers #76477
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Adding new ReadyToRun helper for static cctor #76898
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add missing tests for NamedPipes #72956
    area-System.IO, 8.0.0
  • [JIT] X64 - Three instruction replacement sequence for multiply in certain cases #76981
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix for GitHub issue 76673 and regression test - incorrect static virtual method resolution #76724
    area-VM-coreclr
  • statically linking GC PAL on linux #76985
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Optimize the SqlGuid struct #72549
    area-System.Data.SqlClient, community-contribution
  • Added snake and kebab naming policies to JSON serializer #69613
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [JIT] X64 - More replacement sequences for integer multiplication by a constant #77137
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0][wasm] Fix Wasm.Build.Tests with stable 7.0.0 #76939
    test-failure, NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, 7.0.x
  • Target only net7.0 during source-build - Port of #75168 to main #77052
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [JIT] ARM64 - Do not allow move and shifting with MSL on 16-bit vectors #77123
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add debugger display for huge BigInteger #75796
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] [mono][interp] Fix an issue with deopt and interpreter tiering. #77059
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Fold 'static readonly struct' to constants #77102
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] HttpStress do not use SYS_PTRACE cap for docker runs #77125
    area-System.Net.Http
  • JIT: avoid LCL_FLD stress for locals that already have LCL_FLD appear… #77082
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][tests] Fix FullAOT runtime generic methods test #77079
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • JIT: Support delegate GDV guards in loop cloning #75140
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • JIT: implement tail merging #77103
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] [debugger] First version of multithreaded debugging #74820
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Detect specifical character in EnumConverter.cs #76873
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [mono] Unify invoke code with coreclr #72717
    area-System.Reflection, 8.0.0
  • Prefer OutputRid over PackageRID for output artifacts. #76871
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • SmtpClientTest Assertion Fail Fix #76361
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • [wasm] Use latest stable version of chrome for testing #77133
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • Update Value of TwoDigitYearMax to 2049 #76848
    area-System.Globalization, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
